entry.string: Categories is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: Cetegureees is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: Allows the use of site wide categories for content modules to use as needed.
entry.translation: Elloos zee use-a ooff seete-a veede-a cetegureees fur cuntent mudooles tu use-a es needed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: From the menu, you have two choices. 'Add a New Category', and 'View Categories'.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a tvu chueeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork! 'Edd a Noo Cetegury', und 'Feeoo Cetegureees'.

entry.string: Add a new category -- Allows you to add a new category to your site categories tree.
entry.translation: Edd a noo cetegury -- Elloos yuoo tu edd a noo cetegury tu yuoor seete-a cetegureees tree-a.

entry.string: View Categories -- This area allows you to view the entire categorization tree, allowing a easy way to modify it.
entry.translation: Feeoo Cetegureees -- Thees erea elloos yuoo tu feeoo zee inture-a cetegureezeshun tree-a, ellooeeng a iesy vey tu mudeeffy it. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: The Navigation block allows navigation of any module using the category hooks.
entry.translation: Zee Nefeegeshun bluck elloos nefeegeshun ooff uny mudoole-a useeng zee cetegury huuks.

entry.string: Categories provides all the hooks necessary to allow categories to be available within other modules.
entry.translation: Cetegureees prufeedes ell zee huuks necessery tu elloo cetegureees tu be-a efeeeleble-a veethin oozeer mudooles. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
